channel.title: Web on Brodie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Brodie Blog

item.title: How Does This Work Again?
item.description: I haven't written anything for this blog in a while, so I forget how it was working. Maybe I should further document my process! It occurs to me that I have a few posts about this blog, but nothing seriously describing what it is or how it works! I also forget my password. Entries are written in HTML with a few meta tags at the top. These can then be FTP'd to the server.
